[b]Description:[/b]
Adds 200+ player equipable Shaders and Image Filters. Ever wanted Lydia to look like a Headless Ghost? Now you can! Ever wanted to see the world in Peryite Vision? Try the \"Perception Aura: Plague Vision\".

[b]Installation:[/b]
Unzip the contents into your ...Skyrim\\Data folder. If using the additional Dawnguard Mod make sure its below the main Cosmetic Auras in the Load Aura.

[b]Accessing In-Game:[/b]
On loading the game you will be given books which give an in-game justification for the existence of the mod. You will also be given 4 spells

Power- Awaken Auras: Opens the creation interface similar to the forge/smelter. Requires empty soul gems of any type.
Spell- Touch of Death: Turns vanilla races to/from an undead version. [color=red][b]WARNING:[/b][/color] before you uninstall the mod you must turn everyone back to normal so use frugally.
Spell- Awaken Others Aura: Opens a gift interface to give (and equip) target NPCs.
Spell- Cleanse Others Aura: Returns any Aura NPCs to you and restores them back to their vanilla race.

[b]Creating Auras:[/b]
The use of the Awaken Auras power will bring you to a crafting interface (don’t worry non-smithers it won’t raise your level).

Wood Category:
Translate \"Touch of Death\" book.
Create a cheat tome which in turn gives a power which opens a container full of Auras some dummied out with an *asterisk*. Requires 1 gold coin.

Misc Category:
The main category. Creation of Auras requires empty soul gems which need to be turned into Aura catalysts.

Inert Auras are Auras that can be enchanted and include a decapitation aura to make yourself and others headless. Admittedly Inert Auras are open to some abuse as you can pile enchantments on your character as they don’t take an equipment slot
Shader Auras are split into 16 categories; Absorb, Armour, Colour, Conjuration, Darkness, Detection, Dov, Element, Elemental, Fleshveil, Ghostveil, Gore, Illusion, Light, Nature, Restoration. These are the Auras that set you on fire or turn you into a ghost. These can be disenchanted if you wish to have quicker access to two favourite effects.
Filter Auras are called Perception Auras; these are the Auras that affect the entire screen such as Nighteye.
Black Auras are admittedly a cannibalization of a separate unreleased mod these give you various ‘alternate’ racial benefits and Ghost Resistances. Requires an Effigy created from Black soul gems and a variety of Items or just Black soul gems if same race.

[b]Uninstallation:[/b]
Unequip any Auras and [b][color=red]reverse any use of “The Touch of Death” spell.[/color][/b]
Delete ‘CosmeticAuras.esp’ from the data folder and delete the REB_AuraCleanse, REB_AuraGift, REB_AuraStartupQuest, REB_AuraUndeadRaceSwap and REBAuraForgeScript from the scripts folder.
Dawnguard: Delete ‘Cosmetic Aura DG.esp’ from the Data folder and REB_AuraDLC1Cleanse & REB_AuraDLC1Gift from the Scripts folder.

[b]Known Bugs:[/b]
Touch of Undeath: [u]May[/u] darken the faces of NPCs when using custom bodies, as I made the spell to be used with the ghostveil Auras I consider it an oddity more than a nuisance bug
Disappearing Auras: If a NPC has a resetting inventory (most non-followers) then Auras will vanish, nothing I can do here.
Auras on Creatures: Creatures (such as dogs and dragons) [u]will[/u] unequip Auras when you change cells, a work around is to hit them with the Awaken Others Aura spell again as it should force them to re-equip.
